posts.post_content: I am in need of a Ty Cobb Red Portrait with a Sovereign 350 back and would like to trade my Ty Cobb Red Portrait with a SC 42 Overprint straight up or close.  Shoot me an email if Interested at [url]pilot172000@gmail.com[/url]
Does anybody out there have a Red Cobb with a Sov 350 back they would be willing to trade or sell?
